roleset.name: (cause to) become dirty

roles.note: Arg0 expected to be rare in adj annotation (from dirty.01-j)

example.name: Active
example.text: He dirtied his face with coal dust.

roleset.name: unclean, infused with dirt

roles.note: Arg0 expected to be rare in adj annotation

role.descr: dirt itself, with which arg1 becomes dirty

example.name: arg1, good advice.
example.text: If there are neighborhoods that-1 *PRO*-1 are dirty , keep cleaning them up .
